result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael James Plaster was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
STAYED.
If Defendant complies with DNA sample jail time will be dropped.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael James Plaster

defendant.name: Plaster, Michael James
defendant.address: 5306 Aydee Circle, White Bear Lake, MN 55110

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: c: Def, Atty, DA, SCSO & Jail. eif
filed by ADA Sharon Correll. eif
signed by Def & Atty this date. eif

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot,ADA:  Sharon Correll   DF ATTY:  Joseph Michael Paiement   DF:  Michael James Plaster appeared. Case called at 9:28 am. Court reviews file. ADA Correll presents amended information to the court. Court reviews constitutional rights with Def. Court finds def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. Court reads charge and possible penalties for amended count one, Def pleads Guilty. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates def Guilty of amended Count 1.  Court orders: 
- F/F $300.00. Including costs. 
- $200.00 DNA Surcharge and Sample
- 20 Days Jail STAYED. If Def complys with DNA Sample jail will be dropped
Def to pay today. km

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot,ADA:  Sharon Correll   DF ATTY:  Joseph Michael Paiement   DF:  Michael James Plaster did not appear. Includes 15CF255 and 15CF256. Atty Paiement makes statement. ADA Correll requests STAYED Warrant. Court issues stayed warrant until 9/14/2015. km  Return on warrant scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 09:30 am.
filed by Atty. J. Paiement. gme

CO: Vlack, REP: Deiss, Clerk: Liddle ,ADA:  Sharon Correll   DF ATTY:  Joseph Michael Paiement   DF:  Michael James Plaster appeared. Case called at 3:49 p.m. ADA Correll states defendant would be willing to stipulate to the report in the criminal complaint and not take testimony from the officer. Atty Paiement in agreement. Court based upon the stipulation made, will accept the report, find there is probable cause that a felony has been committed and bind defendant over for trial. ADA Correll has extended an agreement. Address confirmed. Bond continues. hml  Arraignment scheduled for September 11, 2015 at 08:45 am.
No possession of illegal firearms or weapons.

CO: EFV, RPT: Elizabeth Frank, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Sharon Correll,  DF ATTY:  Joseph Michael Paiement,  DF:  Michael James Plaster appeared. Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  Waive speedy prelim. Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 12, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
